description.raw:
* Reorganize systems into plugins that can be loaded at runtime.

    * Adds a SystemPluginManager for finding and loading plugins.
    * Adds a NullSystem plugin to verify multiple plugins can be loaded.
    
* Continued work on systems, focused on loading mechanism.

    * SystemPluginManger -> SystemManager
    * Make System an interface.
    * Add configuration parsing similar to ign-gui
    * Add a test system and configuration
    
* Load systems by name, in the case that multiple are in the same library.
* Codecheck.
* Rework of system\_plugins with new structure taken into account.
description.html:
• Reorganize systems into plugins that can be loaded at runtime.

    • Adds a SystemPluginManager for finding and loading plugins.
    • Adds a NullSystem plugin to verify multiple plugins can be loaded.

  • Continued work on systems, focused on loading mechanism.

    • SystemPluginManger -> SystemManager
    • Make System an interface.
    • Add configuration parsing similar to ign-gui
    • Add a test system and configuration

  • Load systems by name, in the case that multiple are in the same library.

  • Codecheck.
  • Rework of system_plugins with new structure taken into account.
